comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: William Bayard Hale (1869-1924), American journalist and Episcopalian minister. Managing editor of Cosmopolitan, wrote Wilson's campaign biography, reported on international affairs. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Bayard_Hale

comment._content: Thanks penny. We'll fill in the name, and add the date next time we update this record.
